mapper.select: SELECT p.*,nvl(vh_hsn_pk,0) vh_hsn_pk, nvl(ap_apn_pk,0) ap_apn_pk,pb.pbigc_name||' '||ps.psmallc_name as plant FROM post p FULL OUTER JOIN Vlntr_His vl ON p.post_num_pk = vl.post_num_pk FULL OUTER JOIN Ap_post ap ON p.post_num_pk = ap.post_num_pk JOIN psmallc ps ON p.psmallc_pk = ps.psmallc_pk JOIN pbigc pb ON ps.pbigc_pk = pb.pbigc_pk where p.mb_num_pk = #{mb_num_pk} order by p.post_num_pk desc

select * from ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(post pk_post) */ rownum rn,p.post_num_pk,p.mb_num_pk,post_title,post_con,post_dline,post_numof,post_price,post_views,post_date ,nvl(vh_hsn_pk,0) vh_hsn_pk, nvl(ap_apn_pk,0) ap_apn_pk,pb.pbigc_name||' '||ps.psmallc_name as plant FROM post p FULL OUTER JOIN Vlntr_His vl ON p.post_num_pk = vl.post_num_pk FULL OUTER JOIN Ap_post ap ON p.post_num_pk = ap.post_num_pk JOIN psmallc ps ON p.psmallc_pk = ps.psmallc_pk JOIN pbigc pb ON ps.pbigc_pk = pb.pbigc_pk where p.mb_num_pk = #{mb_num_pk} AND rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select COUNT(*) FROM post p FULL OUTER JOIN Vlntr_His vl ON p.post_num_pk = vl.post_num_pk FULL OUTER JOIN Ap_post ap ON p.post_num_pk = ap.post_num_pk JOIN psmallc ps ON p.psmallc_pk = ps.psmallc_pk JOIN pbigc pb ON ps.pbigc_pk = pb.pbigc_pk where p.mb_num_pk = #{mb_num_pk}

mapper.delete: delete from ap_post where POST_NUM_PK = #{post_num_pk} and MB_NUM_PK = #{mb_num_pk}
